text: The 2017 season for began in January at the Tour Down Under. As a UCI WorldTeam, they were automatically invited and obligated to send a squad to every event in the UCI World Tour. ==Team roster== ;Riders who joined the team for the 2017 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2016 team |- |Jenthe Biermans || |- |José Gonçalves || |- |Reto Hollenstein || |- |Robert Kišerlovski || |- |Maurits Lammertink || |- |Tony Martin || |- |Marco Mathis || |- |Baptiste Planckaert || |- |Mads Würtz Schmidt || |- |Rick Zabel || |} ;Riders who left the team during or after the 2016 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2017 team |- |Sergey Chernetskiy || |- |Jacopo Guarnieri || |- |Vladimir Isaichev || |- |Dmitry Kozonchuk || |- |Sergey Lagutin || |- |Alexander Porsev || |- |Joaquim Rodríguez || Retired |- |Egor Silin || |- |Alexey Tsatevich || |- |Jurgen Van den Broeck || |- |Eduard Vorganov || |- |Anton Vorobyev || |} ==Season victories== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
